cta.whatsappMessage: Hello! I would like to know more about Pamps events.

hero.headline: Your child's dream party starts here
hero.subheadline: Specialists in children's parties with complete, climate-controlled space and playground in Belo Horizonte. We also host adult and social events.
hero.imageAlt: Pamps Space - House & Event Space for children's parties

about.title: Children's Party Specialists
about.paragraph1: Pamps is an event space located in the upscale region of Belo Horizonte, near Mineirão Stadium, specialized in unforgettable children's parties. With fixed playground, recreation and complete structure, we create magical moments for children.
about.paragraph2: We also host adult events, social gatherings and corporate events. Our space features complete infrastructure, climate-controlled by dozens of units, enclosed environment, secure and recently renovated, with capacity for up to 150 people.

children.title: Children's Party
children.description: Our specialty! Complete space with fixed playground, recreation and full structure for an unforgettable party

adult.title: Social Events
adult.description: Climate-controlled and customizable structure for your event

corporate.title: Corporate Event
corporate.description: Ideal for corporate and social events

themed.title: Themed Events
themed.description: Full customization according to your needs

ctaSecondary.title: Ready for the dream party?
ctaSecondary.subtitle: Get in touch and discover how we can make your child's party unforgettable. We also host adult and social events.

footer.description: Specialists in children's parties in Belo Horizonte. Complete, climate-controlled space with fixed playground for unforgettable moments.

calculator.title: Event Estimate Calculator

salgados.label: Number of savory items per person
salgados.tip: We recommend 5 to 7 savory items per person for 4h to 6h events

doces.label: Number of sweets per person
doces.tip: We recommend 3 to 5 sweets per person for 4h to 6h events

result.disclaimer: Values are average estimates. Confirm packages with a consultant.

calculator.whatsappMessage: Hello, I did a simulation on the website. My event has {people} people, on {day}, {package} package, with {salgados} savory items and {doces} sweets per person. Optionals: {optionals}. Estimated value: {total}.
